mapper.select: update INSBOrderpaymentflow set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},orderid = #{orderid},paychannelid = #{paychannelid},tradeno = #{tradeno},insurecono = #{insurecono},payurl = #{payurl},paywapurl = #{paywapurl},paypcurl = #{paypcurl},amount = #{amount},paytime = #{paytime},payresult = #{payresult},currencycode = #{currencycode},merchantid = #{merchantid},merchantname = #{merchantname},allowchangepaystyle = #{allowchangepaystyle},paypoundage = #{paypoundage},paymentransaction = #{paymentransaction},payflowno = #{payflowno},payorderno = #{payorderno},md5 = #{md5},subinstanceid = #{subinstanceid} where id = #{id}
